titleStmt.title: Description of British Library, Add Ch 1251: Latin deed with Hebrew acknowledgment

availability.licence: These images and the content of British Library Add Ch 1251: Latin deed with Hebrew acknowledgment are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. notesStmt.note: Two slashes meant to accommodate the parchment strip of Add MS Ch.1250.

Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965 and Olszowy-Schlanger, Judith. Hebrew and Hebrew-Latin Documents from Medieval England: a diplomatic and Palaeographical Study. Turnhout: Brill, 2015.

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 1; ruled lines: 4 5; written lines: 4 5; A small piece of parchment. The Hebrew text written on the verso of a Latin charter.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Hebrew Ashkenazi documentary script of the 12th century.

history.provenance: Acquisition: Presented to the British Museum by C.P. Cooper, Esq. in 1835.
